我们自研了两款机械臂，一款是高负重比的工业臂，另一款是超轻力感的家用臂，你是想了解哪一款啊？
We've developed two types of robotic arms: industrial arm with a high load-to-weight ratio and household arm with ultra-light force sensing. Which one are you interested in?
我们自研的高负载自重比机械臂，用的是自研的关节模组，重量只有8.5公斤，但却能够举起6公斤的重物！负载自重比达到了70%呢， 这在工业机械臂中是非常优秀的！
We've developed a high-load, low-self-weight robotic arm with our own joint modules. It weighs only 8.5 kilograms but can lift a hefty 6 kilograms! The load-to-weight ratio is a whopping 70%, which is pretty impressive for industrial robotic arms.
我们自研的超轻力感机械臂实现了0.625的负重比，能够举起3公斤的重物，而自身体重仅有4.8公斤，这可是在所有能举这么重的机械臂里最轻的呢！ 我的腕关节还拥有超级敏感的触觉！它是一个超薄六维力传感器，能够感受到100牛顿的力量，还有5倍的过载能力，9mm的厚度是行业内最薄的！
We've created an ultra-light force-sensitive robotic arm with a load-to-weight ratio of 0.625, capable of lifting 3 kilograms while weighing only 4.8 kilograms itself. That's the lightest among all robotic arms that can lift such a weight! My wrist joint has super-sensitive touch! It's an ultra-thin six-axis force sensor that can detect forces up to 100 Newtons, with a 5 times overload capacity, and a thickness of just 9mm, which is the thinnest in the industry!
我们的一体化关节模组就像是个宝藏箱，里面藏着驱动器、减速器、力传感器这些超级厉害的小部件。这些都是我们自己研发的哦！ 而且，我们用极致的器件布局设计和结构设计，把每一个小部件都安排得整整齐齐，让机械臂变得既强大又轻便。 你想再深入了解哪部分，让【美拉】给你再好好介绍一下！

Let [Mera] give you a more detailed introduction!
我们自研驱动器，电流密度比市场同类产品提升20%呢
Our self-developed actuator has increased current density by 20% compared to similar products on the market.
我们攻克了谐波减速器正向设计分析、测试评价体系的共性关键技术，这在技术上可是打破了国外垄断， 成为了国内自主研发的佼佼者，这可是让我们超级骄傲的事情呢！
We've mastered the common key technologies of forward design analysis and testing evaluation system for harmonic reducers, this has technically broken the foreign monopoly and made us a leader in domestic independent research and development, which is something we're super proud of!
首先，我们的原位力感知传感器采用了无弹性体设计，突破了空间和重量的限制让我们的机器人核心部件变得更加轻薄； 接着，我们的微型六维力传感器还采用了硅应变敏感技术，再加上我们突破性的低应力技术，让传感器的精度更高，是机器人能够精确地感知到周围的每一个微小变化。
First, our in-situ force sensor uses an elastic-free design, this design breakthrough overcomes the limitations of space and weight, making our robot's core components more lightweight and thin. Next, our mini six-axis force sensor also uses silicon strain-sensitive technology, and our breakthrough low-stress technology makes the sensor more accurate and reduces the impact of crosstalk, allowing it to precisely perceive every tiny change in the surroundings.
我们的3D视觉相机使用了自主研发的低成本、高可靠的柔性MOEMS光电扫描技术。 这个技术就像是给机器人的眼睛装上了超级灵活的眼球，让双目视觉中的散斑数量提高5倍以上，检测精度提高两倍以上。 而且，我们的相机还突破了传统双目视觉在精细任务中的技术瓶颈，提供了一个性价比极高的解决方案。
Our 3D vision camera uses a self-developed low-cost and highly reliable flexible MOEMS (Micro-Opto-Electro-Mechanical System) optical scanning technology. This technology is like equipping a robot's eyes with super-flexible eyeballs, which increases the number of speckles in binocular vision by more than five times and improves detection accuracy by more than two times. In addition, our camera has also overcome the technical bottleneck of traditional binocular vision in fine tasks and provides a cost-effective solution.
我们自研的多触感柔型灵巧手采用仿人包握的构型设计，能自适应抓握不同的工具，提供更强抓握力； 我的手指可是有10倍高抓重比的主动关节呢！ 此外还有自适应的柔型防撞回弹，保证异常碰撞时不造成意外的损伤； 最后，还有在单指面内提供14点高密度敏感单元的自研柔型超薄触觉传感器，给我提供多维的传感信息。
We've developed a multi-tactile soft and dexterous hand with a human-like gripping design that can adapt to hold different tools and provide a stronger grip. My fingers also have actively controlled joints with 10 times higher grip-to-weight ratio! In addition, there is also an adaptive flexible anti-collision rebound, which ensures that no unexpected damage is caused during abnormal collisions. Finally, there is also a self-developed flexible ultra-thin tactile sensor that provides me with multi-dimensional sensing information with 14 high-density sensitive units within a single finger surface.
我们的柔型超薄触觉传感器，采用了高精度接触式压阻传感技术，就像给机器人穿上了一双超级灵敏的手套，保证它能够稳定可靠地感知到外界的触碰； 而且，我们的传感器采用了层叠式敏感单元封装集成，就像是把许多小小的传感器叠在一起，实现了传感器的小型化和轻量化； 我们的传感器还特别省电，功耗低至0.3W，能够在不消耗太多能量的情况下工作很长时间； 最酷的是，我们的传感器能够在单指面内提供14点高密度敏感单元，就像是在机器人的手指上安装了14个超级灵敏的触觉点，能够为机器人提供多维的传感信息。
Our tactile sensors are super thin and flexible, using high-precision contact-based piezoresistive sensing technology. It's like we've put the robot in a pair of super sensitive gloves, ensuring it can reliably sense touch from the outside. Plus, our sensors use a stacked sensitive unit packaging integration, kind of like stacking lots of tiny sensors on top of each other, which achieves miniaturization and lightweighting of the sensors. Our sensors are also very power-efficient, with a power consumption as low as 0.3W, allowing them to work for a long time without using much energy. The coolest part is that our sensors can provide 14 high-density sensitive units on a single finger surface, like installing 14 super-sensitive touch points on the robot's fingers, offering multidimensional sensory information to the robot.
我们从0到1搭建了自己的具身智能软件平台，这就像是给机器人打造了一个超级聪明的大脑，让它能够实现语音交互、决策规划和运动控制的一体化方案。 这就像是我们的机器人能够听懂我们的话，理解我们的需求，然后做出最合适的动作。 同时，我们的大模型感知及决策技术也是我们自己研发的！这意味着我们的机器人能够像人类一样感知世界，做出明智的决策。 你想再深入了解哪部分，让【美拉】给你再好好介绍一下！
We've built our own embodied intelligence software platform from scratch, which is like giving the robot a super smart brain, enabling it to achieve an integrated solution for voice interaction, decision-making planning, and motion control. It's like our robots can understand what we say, grasp our needs, and then make the most suitable moves. Our large-scale perception and decision-making technology is also developed by us! This means our robots can perceive the world like humans and make wise decisions. Which part would you like to delve deeper into? Let [Mera] give you a more detailed introduction!
我们搭建了智能视觉与智能仿真的基础平台，智能视觉就像是机器人的眼睛，它负责捕捉视觉信息，帮助机器人理解周围的环境。这就像是我们的机器人能够看到世界，知道哪里有障碍，哪里有目标。 仿真平台就像是机器人的大脑，就像我们人类的大脑通过想象和规划预测我们的行为结果一样，它负责模拟和预测机器人在现实世界的行为。 这就像是我们的机器人能够在行动之前，先在大脑里预演一遍，确保每一步都是最完美的。
We've set up a fundamental platform for intelligent vision and intelligent simulation. Intelligent vision is like the robot's eyes, capturing visual information to help the robot understand its surroundings. It's like our robots can see the world, knowing where the obstacles are and where the targets are. The simulation platform is like the robot's brain. Just as our human brains imagine and plan to predict the outcomes of our actions, it's responsible for simulating and predicting the robot's behavior in the real world. It's like our robots can rehearse in their minds before taking action, ensuring every step is perfect.
智能体技能学习就像是机器人的小脑，它可以帮助协调和细化机器人的动作，让机器人的动作更加流畅和自然。
agent skill learning is like the robot's cerebellum. It helps coordinate and refine the robot's movements, making them smoother and more natural.
智能体规划和推理，就像是机器人的前额叶，负责更高阶的认知功能，可以让机器人像人类一样制定行动规划、解决问题和做出决策。这就像是我们的机器人能够思考，能够计划，能够解决复杂的问题。
Intelligent planning and reasoning are like the robot's frontal lobes, responsible for higher-level cognitive functions. This allows the robot to make action plans, solve problems, and make decisions just like humans. It's like our robots can think, plan, and tackle complex problems.
